com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css

Class Top

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.core.AbstractCssProperty<Top>
      • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.Top
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CssProperty, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Top
extends AbstractCssProperty<Top>
     For absolutely positioned elements, the top property sets the top edge of an element to a unit above/below the top edge of its containing element.

 For relatively positioned elements, the top property sets the top edge of an element to a unit above/below its normal position.

 Note: If "position:static", the top property has no effect.
 Default value:  auto
 Inherited:      no
 Animatable:     yes
 Version:        CSS2
 JavaScript syntax:      object.style.top="100px"
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    WFF
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
